title: Review: Play and Loss, and Unusual Rituals of Mourning
description: Vanessa Anspaugh’s dance “Mourning After Mornings” discovers and creates its own logic, mixing humor with grief.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert

media:content.media:description: Novel rituals: from left, Laura Osterhaus Rosenstone, Jo Warren, Anna Azrieli and C Green in “Mourning After Mornings.”
